title: End-to-End Instagram Clone
description: Built an Instagram clone on an AWS EC2 instance with client-side dynamic components for real-time updates of posts, likes, and comments through REST API endpoints. Code unavailable due to University of Michigan honor code.

title: Best of Ann Arbor 2024
description: Every year, The Michigan Daily compiles the most popular Ann Arbor businesses as voted on by our readership. In 2024, I served as the project manager and one of the web developers for the accompanying React-based website.

title: The Michigan Daily's Crossword Puzzles
description: I help maintain the codebase for The Michigan Daily's games. I previously worked on changes to crossword logic and I'm currently implementing author pages for Crossword Constructors.

title: M-Pact
description: Club participation is a significant part of University of Michigan campus culture, but the task of joining clubs is often complex and overwhelming for students. As a 5-week project for my product design class, I sought to explore how I might aid undergraduate students in streamlining the club discovery process.

title: Marquee Arts Redesign
description: Marquee Arts is an arts non-profit in Ann Arbor, MI. They own the State Theatre and the Michigan Theater, where they host film screenings and live events. As part of a class project, I redesigned the Marquee Arts checkout process for ticket purchases to streamline usability and business needs, based on research findings and best responsive design practices.
